summary: Я имею более 4 лет опыта в разработке мобильных кроссплатформенных приложений и веб приложений. За все время работы имел опыт проектирования и построения архитектуры, был тех/тим лидом небольшой команды и руководил процессом разработки, а так же занимался оценкой приходящих проектов.

responsibilities: Development of cross-platform mobile and web applications

projects.name: Travel application
projects.descriptions: An application for tourists with information about various activities on the islands, the ability to plan and book flights between the islands.

projects.name: Social Media Application
projects.descriptions: A platform aims to create reliable entertainment events by gathering artists, event producers, and fans in a virtual network, integrating Blockchain technology to support secure transactions through Smart Contracts and deliver unforgettable experiences. There is also a possibility to chat with each other, write comments, share posts with followers and follow other people. With this network, users can have a great time not only in good planned events, but just chatting or creating stories.

projects.name: Application for Nutritionists
projects.descriptions: A platform that brings dietitians and their clients together in one place: a directory of nutritionists, a forum with articles and the opportunity to ask questions to experts.
projects.role: React Native Software Engineer, co Team-Leader

projects.name: Iflot - Yacht and boat rental service for water adventures
projects.descriptions: There are dozens of companies on the yacht rental market in Moscow and St. Petersburg that offer their services on the Internet. To rent a yacht, you will have to call by phone, communicate with the manager, find out the prices, check if the vessel is free for the day you need - in other words, spend hours of your time. We are accustomed to ordering food, calling a taxi, booking a car or accommodation while traveling using mobile applications, so it’s the turn of the yachts!

projects.name: Twist
projects.descriptions: This is a mobile application for booking beauty services in the salon and shopping for curly people.

projects.name: Borodach - Barbershop booking app and online beauty store
projects.descriptions: Borodach is one of the largest barbershop chains in Russia. To register clients for services, the guys used Yclients.

projects.name: Sale of the spare parts
projects.descriptions: Mobile cross-platform application and web application for the sale of spare parts. The main functions are publication of spare parts advertisements, search and filtering of advertisements. Linking spare parts with a car and a point of sale, importing spare parts from Excel, a role-based system with customizable access for legal entities.

projects.name: Dating app for pet lovers
projects.descriptions: Tinder like application for pet lovers

projects.name: Mobile banking for business
projects.descriptions: Mobile cross-platform banking application for legal entities. The main functions are making various payments from transfer to paying taxes, a role-based system with customizable access for employees.

projects.name: Booking App
projects.descriptions: BookingApp is a cross-platform application that provides convenient functions for finding different establishments and booking. The main functions are searching for establishments by filters, booking which includes service, wizards, date and time.
